basics.name: Achille Lacoin
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software engineer with a strong interest in API design.

work.name: Deta
highlights: Overhauled the local development experience in the space CLI
Improved build pipeline compatibility and feature set
Contributed to the specification of horizon

work.name: Dailymotion
work.summary: A Video Platform with 300 million unique visitors per month
highlights: Built a dependency resolver for airflow, allowing backfill accross multiple clusters
Worked on an IAB categorization pipeline that piped each uploaded video to a machine learning model
Contenairized the whole recommendation pipeline, and migrated it to Kubernetes Engine
Created a high-performance golang api backed by a real-time database for a dashboarding tool used by dailymotion creators

publications.name: How to debug Bubble Tea applications in Visual Studio Code
publications.summary: I did'nt find any documentation BubbleTea debugging, so I wrote a blog post to share how I achieved it.

publications.name: Getting started with Data Lineage
publications.summary: A summary of what we've worked on during my first internship at Dailymotion, written by my mentor

projects.name: Sunbeam
projects.description: Generates complexes TUI from simple scripts written in any language
highlights: Supports all platforms, can be extended with any language
Flexible extension system based on git
Can run as an headless http server

projects.name: Excalidraw Extension
projects.description: Edit Excalidraw diagrams, right from VS Code
highlights: Adopted as an official product by the excalidraw organization
Can edit diagrams as raw png/svg files
More than 30K downloads in VS Code marketplace + Open VSX
